                        )

                            [1] => 1. Select Range for each of the buckets
                            [2] => Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.1.min_value', array('bktId' => 1, 'value' => $numberOfQuestionsPerTheme, 'label' => false, 'div' => false, 'type' => 'text'));

                            [4] => for ($i = 1; $i Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.id', array('class' => '', 'value' => $sliderData['scores'][$bkt - 1]['CfaCtScore']['id'], 'label' => false, 'div' => false));
                            [5] => }

                            [7] => echo $this->Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.cfa_core_theme_id', array('class' => '', 'value' => $sliderData['cfaCoreThemeId'], 'label' => false, 'div' => false));
                            [8] => }
                            [9] => echo $this->Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.bucket_number', array('class' => '', 'value' => $bkt, 'label' => false, 'div' => false));
                            [10] => ?>
                            [11] => Form->input('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.min_value', array('id' => 'bkt' . $i, 'class' => 'bktTextBox', 'bktId' => $i, 'value' => '', 'label' => false, 'div' => array('class' => 'bktDivClass inputField', 'id' => 'bktDiv' . $i), 'type' => 'text'));
                            [12] => ?>
                            [13] => -
                            [14] => Form->input('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.max_value', array('id' => 'bkt' . ($i + 1), 'class' => 'bktTextBox', 'bktId' => ($i + 1), 'value' => '', 'label' => false, 'div' => array('class' => 'bktDivClass inputField', 'id' => 'bktDiv' . ($i + 1),), 'type' => 'text'));
                            [15] => ?>
                            [16] => Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . ($bkt - 1) . '.max_value', //($bkt-1) is written because $bkt has been increased than upper value of 9
                            [17] => array('bktId' => ($totalBuckets * 2), //total bucket blocks are 18 so each bucket has two values min and max
                            [18] => 'value' => ($numberOfQuestionsPerTheme * $totalResponses), 'label' => false, 'div' => false, 'type' => 'text'));
                            [19] => echo $this->Form->hidden('Slider.min_scale_value', array('value' => '', 'id' => 'minScaleValue'));
                            [20] => echo $this->Form->hidden('Slider.max_scale_value', array('value' => '', 'id' => 'maxScaleValue'));
                            [21] => ?>
                            [22] => Reset
                            [23] => 2. Place buckets in the appropriate boxes
                            [24] => Click on a bucket value in the 'Most Suited' box and drag and drop it in
                            [25] => 'Acceptable' box or the 'Fail' box to set the scores.
                            [26] => Acceptable
                            [27] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [28] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [29] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 1) {
                            [30] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [31] => } ?>
                            [32] => Most Suited
                            [33] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [34] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [35] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 2) { //value 2 is for most suited
                            [36] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [37] => } ?>
                            [38] => Fail
                            [39] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [40] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [41] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [42] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [43] => }
                            [44] => ?>
                            [45] => '. $i .':';
                            [46] => echo $this->Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $i . '.points', array('id' => 'bucket_state' . $i, 'value' => $sliderData['bucketStates'][$i], 'label' => false, 'div' => false, 'type' => 'text', 'class' => 'bucketStateClass'));
                            [47] => }
                            [48] => ?>
                            [49] => Selected Scores
                            [50] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [51] => $bktStatusClass = '';
                            [52] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [53] => $bktStatusClass = 'failBlock';
                            [54] => } elseif ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 1) {
                            [55] => $bktStatusClass = 'acceptableBlock';
                            [56] => }
                            [57] => ?>
                            [58] => 0 - 0
                        )

                    [h3] => Array
                        (
                            [0] => Acceptable
                        )

                    [span] => Array
                        (
                            [0] => 'Most Suited'
                        )

    [/home/webonise/projects/apps2013/php/Crucible-CRT/app/View/Elements] => Array
        (
            [score_slider.ctp] => Array
                (
                    [para_message] => Array
                        (
                            [0] => <p class="setScoreStep">1. Select Range for each of the buckets</p>
                            [1] => <p class="setScoreStep noSpace">2. Place buckets in the appropriate boxes</p>
                        )

                    [alert_messages] => Array
                        (
                            [0] => Please Correct the scoring error
                            [1] => Please save score
                        )

                    [div] => Array
                        (
                            [0] => Set score for each Culture theme
                            [1] => 1. Select Range for each of the buckets
                            [2] => Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.1.min_value', array('bktId' => 1, 'value' => $numberOfQuestionsPerTheme, 'label' => false, 'div' => false, 'type' => 'text'));
                            [3] => $bkt = 1;
                            [4] => for ($i = 1; $i Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.id', array('class' => '', 'value' => $sliderData['scores'][$bkt - 1]['CfaCtScore']['id'], 'label' => false, 'div' => false));
                            [5] => }
                            [6] => if (isset($sliderData['cfaCoreThemeId'])) {
                            [7] => echo $this->Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.cfa_core_theme_id', array('class' => '', 'value' => $sliderData['cfaCoreThemeId'], 'label' => false, 'div' => false));
                            [8] => }
                            [9] => echo $this->Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.bucket_number', array('class' => '', 'value' => $bkt, 'label' => false, 'div' => false));
                            [10] => ?>
                            [11] => Form->input('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.min_value', array('id' => 'bkt' . $i, 'class' => 'bktTextBox', 'bktId' => $i, 'value' => '', 'label' => false, 'div' => array('class' => 'bktDivClass inputField', 'id' => 'bktDiv' . $i), 'type' => 'text'));
                            [12] => ?>
                            [13] => -
                            [14] => Form->input('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.max_value', array('id' => 'bkt' . ($i + 1), 'class' => 'bktTextBox', 'bktId' => ($i + 1), 'value' => '', 'label' => false, 'div' => array('class' => 'bktDivClass inputField', 'id' => 'bktDiv' . ($i + 1),), 'type' => 'text'));
                            [15] => ?>
                            [16] => Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . ($bkt - 1) . '.max_value', //($bkt-1) is written because $bkt has been increased than upper value of 9
                            [17] => array('bktId' => ($totalBuckets * 2), //total bucket blocks are 18 so each bucket has two values min and max
                            [18] => 'value' => ($numberOfQuestionsPerTheme * $totalResponses), 'label' => false, 'div' => false, 'type' => 'text'));
                            [19] => echo $this->Form->hidden('Slider.min_scale_value', array('value' => '', 'id' => 'minScaleValue'));
                            [20] => echo $this->Form->hidden('Slider.max_scale_value', array('value' => '', 'id' => 'maxScaleValue'));
                            [21] => ?>
                            [22] => Reset
                            [23] => 2. Place buckets in the appropriate boxes
                            [24] => Click on a bucket value in the 'Most Suited' box and drag and drop it in
                            [25] => 'Acceptable' box or the 'Fail' box to set the scores.
                            [26] => Acceptable
                            [27] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [28] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [29] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 1) {
                            [30] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [31] => } ?>
                            [32] => Most Suited
                            [33] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [34] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [35] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 2) { //value 2 is for most suited
                            [36] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [37] => } ?>
                            [38] => Fail
                            [39] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [40] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [41] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [42] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [43] => }
                            [44] => ?>
                            [45] => '. $i .':';
                            [46] => echo $this->Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $i . '.points', array('id' => 'bucket_state' . $i, 'value' => $sliderData['bucketStates'][$i], 'label' => false, 'div' => false, 'type' => 'text', 'class' => 'bucketStateClass'));
                            [47] => }
                            [48] => ?>
                            [49] => Selected Scores
                            [50] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [51] => $bktStatusClass = '';
                            [52] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [53] => $bktStatusClass = 'failBlock';
                            [54] => } elseif ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 1) {
                            [55] => $bktStatusClass = 'acceptableBlock';
                            [56] => }
                            [57] => ?>
                            [58] => 0 - 0
                        )

                    [h3] => Array
                        (
                            [0] => Acceptable

                            [13] => -
                            [14] => Form->input('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.max_value', array('id' => 'bkt' . ($i + 1), 'class' => 'bktTextBox', 'bktId' => ($i + 1), 'value' => '', 'label' => false, 'div' => array('class' => 'bktDivClass inputField', 'id' => 'bktDiv' . ($i + 1),), 'type' => 'text'));

                            [31] => } ?>
                            [32] => Most Suited
                            [33] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [34] => $statusClass = 'deActive';

                            [36] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [37] => } ?>
                            [38] => Fail
                            [39] => $bktIdStr) {

                            [48] => ?>
                            [49] => Selected Scores
                            [50] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [51] => $bktStatusClass = '';
                            [52] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [53] => $bktStatusClass = 'failBlock';
                            [54] => } elseif ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 1) {
                            [55] => $bktStatusClass = 'acceptableBlock';
                            [56] => }
                            [57] => ?>
                            [58] => 0 - 0

                            [0] => 'Most Suited'

                            [12] => ?>
                            [13] => -
                            [14] => Form->input('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.max_value', array('id' => 'bkt' . ($i + 1), 'class' => 'bktTextBox', 'bktId' => ($i + 1), 'value' => '', 'label' => false, 'div' => array('class' => 'bktDivClass inputField', 'id' => 'bktDiv' . ($i + 1),), 'type' => 'text'));

                            [17] => array('bktId' => ($totalBuckets * 2), //total bucket blocks are 18 so each bucket has two values min and max
                            [18] => 'value' => ($numberOfQuestionsPerTheme * $totalResponses), 'label' => false, 'div' => false, 'type' => 'text'));

                            [20] => echo $this->Form->hidden('Slider.max_scale_value', array('value' => '', 'id' => 'maxScaleValue'));

                            [28] => $statusClass = 'deActive';

                            [30] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [31] => } ?>
                            [32] => Most Suited
                            [33] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [34] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [35] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 2) { //value 2 is for most suited
                            [36] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [37] => } ?>
                            [38] => Fail
                            [39] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [40] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [41] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [42] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [43] => }
                            [44] => ?>
                            [45] => '. $i .':';

                            [48] => ?>
                            [49] => Selected Scores
                            [50] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [51] => $bktStatusClass = '';

                            [53] => $bktStatusClass = 'failBlock';
                            [54] => } elseif ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 1) {
                            [55] => $bktStatusClass = 'acceptableBlock';
                            [56] => }
                            [57] => ?>
                            [58] => 0 - 0
                        )

                            [0] => Acceptable
                        )

                            [0] => 'Most Suited'

                            [31] => } ?>

                            [33] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [34] => $statusClass = 'deActive';

                            [36] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [37] => } ?>
                            [38] => Fail
                            [39] => $bktIdStr) {

                            [42] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [43] => }

                            [48] => ?>
                            [49] => Selected Scores
                            [50] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [51] => $bktStatusClass = '';
                            [52] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [53] => $bktStatusClass = 'failBlock';
                            [54] => } elseif ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 1) {
                            [55] => $bktStatusClass = 'acceptableBlock';
                            [56] => }
                            [57] => ?>
                            [58] => 0 - 0
                        )

                        (
                            [0] => Acceptable

                            [0] => 'Most Suited'

                            [13] => -
                            [14] => Form->input('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.max_value', array('id' => 'bkt' . ($i + 1), 'class' => 'bktTextBox', 'bktId' => ($i + 1), 'value' => '', 'label' => false, 'div' => array('class' => 'bktDivClass inputField', 'id' => 'bktDiv' . ($i + 1),), 'type' => 'text'));

                            [30] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [31] => } ?>
                            [32] => Most Suited
                            [33] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [34] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [35] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 2) { //value 2 is for most suited
                            [36] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [37] => } ?>
                            [38] => Fail
                            [39] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [40] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [41] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [42] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [43] => }

                            [48] => ?>
                            [49] => Selected Scores
                            [50] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [51] => $bktStatusClass = '';
                            [52] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [53] => $bktStatusClass = 'failBlock';
                            [54] => } elseif ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 1) {
                            [55] => $bktStatusClass = 'acceptableBlock';
                            [56] => }
                            [57] => ?>
                            [58] => 0 - 0

                            [0] => Acceptable

                            [0] => 'Most Suited'

                            [7] => echo $this->Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.cfa_core_theme_id', array('class' => '', 'value' => $sliderData['cfaCoreThemeId'], 'label' => false, 'div' => false));
                            [8] => }
                            [9] => echo $this->Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.bucket_number', array('class' => '', 'value' => $bkt, 'label' => false, 'div' => false));
                            [10] => ?>
                            [11] => Form->input('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.min_value', array('id' => 'bkt' . $i, 'class' => 'bktTextBox', 'bktId' => $i, 'value' => '', 'label' => false, 'div' => array('class' => 'bktDivClass inputField', 'id' => 'bktDiv' . $i), 'type' => 'text'));
                            [12] => ?>
                            [13] => -
                            [14] => Form->input('CfaCtScore.' . $bkt . '.max_value', array('id' => 'bkt' . ($i + 1), 'class' => 'bktTextBox', 'bktId' => ($i + 1), 'value' => '', 'label' => false, 'div' => array('class' => 'bktDivClass inputField', 'id' => 'bktDiv' . ($i + 1),), 'type' => 'text'));
                            [15] => ?>
                            [16] => Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . ($bkt - 1) . '.max_value', //($bkt-1) is written because $bkt has been increased than upper value of 9
                            [17] => array('bktId' => ($totalBuckets * 2), //total bucket blocks are 18 so each bucket has two values min and max
                            [18] => 'value' => ($numberOfQuestionsPerTheme * $totalResponses), 'label' => false, 'div' => false, 'type' => 'text'));
                            [19] => echo $this->Form->hidden('Slider.min_scale_value', array('value' => '', 'id' => 'minScaleValue'));
                            [20] => echo $this->Form->hidden('Slider.max_scale_value', array('value' => '', 'id' => 'maxScaleValue'));
                            [21] => ?>
                            [22] => Reset
                            [23] => 2. Place buckets in the appropriate boxes
                            [24] => Click on a bucket value in the 'Most Suited' box and drag and drop it in
                            [25] => 'Acceptable' box or the 'Fail' box to set the scores.
                            [26] => Acceptable
                            [27] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [28] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [29] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 1) {
                            [30] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [31] => } ?>
                            [32] => Most Suited
                            [33] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [34] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [35] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 2) { //value 2 is for most suited
                            [36] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [37] => } ?>
                            [38] => Fail
                            [39] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [40] => $statusClass = 'deActive';
                            [41] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [42] => $statusClass = 'activeBlock';
                            [43] => }
                            [44] => ?>
                            [45] => '. $i .':';
                            [46] => echo $this->Form->hidden('CfaCtScore.' . $i . '.points', array('id' => 'bucket_state' . $i, 'value' => $sliderData['bucketStates'][$i], 'label' => false, 'div' => false, 'type' => 'text', 'class' => 'bucketStateClass'));
                            [47] => }
                            [48] => ?>
                            [49] => Selected Scores
                            [50] => $bktIdStr) {
                            [51] => $bktStatusClass = '';
                            [52] => if ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 0) {
                            [53] => $bktStatusClass = 'failBlock';
                            [54] => } elseif ($sliderData['bucketStates'][$bktIdNum] == 1) {
                            [55] => $bktStatusClass = 'acceptableBlock';
                            [56] => }
                            [57] => ?>
                            [58] => 0 - 0
                        )

                    [h3] => Array
                        (
                            [0] => Acceptable
                        )

                    [span] => Array
                        (
                            [0] => 'Most Suited'
                        )

                )

        )

)
